Q: How do I modify the nickname?

A: Nickname is the name you show to others. If you login with a QQ account or Sina micro blog account, your QQ and Sina nicknames and avatars will be displayed. You can also modify the avatar and nickname, and save the changes.
Q: How do I level up?

A: Your level is affected by your points. You get one point for each chip you win, and lose one point for each chip you lose. With the change of your points, your level will also change. Points can also be negative.
Q: How do I get into high level game fields?
A: In Le Le Texas Hold\'em, the entry requirements are related to your chip amount, you can gather enough chips in the lower level fields before you enter high level fields.
Q: How can I enter my friend\'s room?
A: You can find your friend\'s room by searching the room ID, and enter (if you meet the room entry requirements)
Q: How do I get more chips?
A: You can get chips by defeating other players in the game fields, through recharge, or daily quests.
Q: How do I contact customer service?
A: Texas Hold\'em customer service contacts:

VPIP stands for Voluntarily Put $ In Pot. This stat shows the percentage of time you make calls or raises before the flop
PFR stands for Pre Flop Raise. This stat shows the percentage of the time a player raises before the flop.
A 3-bet as most players use the term means the act of putting in the third bet, technically the second “raise”, the “3-bet” during any given round of action.
F-3bet stands for 3bet flod. This stat shows the percentage of the time a player fold after the 3bet.
Steal is a term used in poker for when a player in late position raises pre-flop in an attempt to win the uncontested blinds.
When a player makes a steal attempt, restealing means raising back into the original raiser as a bluff.
The percentage of the time that a player bet the Flop given that he had a chance to do so and he made the last raise preflop.
% of times player puts money into pot.
There is no race record currently.
There is no historical record currently.
Location services must be turned on to join this game. Go and set!
GPS restrictions have been set in this game, please note that players nearby can not join together.
Player will join the game when at the big blind.

If not at the big blind or small blind, player will join the game after the amount of big blind chips is deducted. If at the small blind, you will join the game after the extra amount of small blind is deducted.If at the big blind, you will join the game immediately.
Waiting mode is selected by default, Click posting to join the game in the next round.

获取参赛人员数据失败!(PM)
MTT name can not be empty!
%s tournament is going to start in 1 minute. Please enter the room and be prepared! Wish you good luck!
%s tournament is going to start in 1 minute. Go get seated!
Only players approved by the creator could sign up. Players can\'t rebuy/add-on unless the creator agrees. For the fair of the game, when Bring-in Control is on, the creator can\'t play the game.
When Buy-in request is off, players could sign up and rebuy/add-on freely.

MTT, Multiply table tournament, is comprised of many different tables, each with several players who are all competing with the same coins. As the blind increases, the tournament proceeds until one player has accumulated all the coins in play.
1. When there are less than 2 players, the MTT will be cancelled and sign-up fee will be returned.During the final game, it\'s not allowed to enter anymore.
2. When Buy-in Request is on, players can\'t rebuy/add-on unless the room owner agrees. For the fair of the game, when Buy-in Request is on, the room owner can\'t play the game.
3. Players will get coins in each game to calculate what they have earned in the tournament. (Coins and chips are different)

4. Rebuy: In tournament that rebuy is not banned, players could buy an amount of coins with chips when they have less than the initial amount before certain blind level. Each tournament has its rebuy quota. Players with 0 coins will be knocked out or rebuy coins to continue.

5. Add-on: In tournament that add-on is not banned, players could tap "Add-on" to buy 1.5*coins with chips at a certain blind level. Players with 0 coin will be knocked out or could add-on to continue.
6. Ante: A forced bet required of all players before the hand begins.

7. Players will be ranked according to the order they leave the game. The first one who loses all coins will be the last, etc. If more than 1 player are knocked out at the same time, those with higher card ranking or more initial coins will get higher rank. If they have same card ranking and initial coins, they split the prize of their rank. For example, if 2 players get No.2 at the same time, they split the prize of No.2 and No.3 rank.
8. Play proceeds until one player has accumulated all the coins in play. The player will be the champion.
